first_para: Sir Peter Hannay Bailey Tapsell (born 1 February 1930) is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom and the Member of Parliament (MP) for Louth and Horncastle. He has served in the House of Commons continuously since 1966 and was also previously an MP from 1959 to 1964. He has been the Father of the House since the 2010 general election.

full.extract: Sir Peter Hannay Bailey Tapsell (born 1 February 1930) is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom and the Member of Parliament (MP) for Louth and Horncastle. He has served in the House of Commons continuously since 1966 and was also previously an MP from 1959 to 1964. He has been the Father of the House since the 2010 general election.
full.title: Peter Tapsell (British politician)
